about_the_game:
Show your support by buying the developer some fries!

In return for your generosity, you will receive:
The Bandit Skin

If you can't right now or aren't interested then no pressure!





*Note: Funds may not necessarily go towards food.
**Skin alters TP model only.

name: Buy The Dev Some Fries - Bullet Bash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 64 Bit (Maybe Windows 7?)
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 560X 4GB or Nvidia Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Show your support by buying the developer some fries! You will receive the Bandit skin as a sign of appreciation! If you can't right now or aren't interested then no pressure! *Note: Funds may not necessarily go towards food.
